Purpose: To accurately and timely measure allergen-specific IgE to Mountain Cedar in serum, ensuring consistency, reliability, and traceability of results.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Phadia ImmunoCAP), centrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer, refrigerator, freezer, computer with LIS
